name: Robot Arm
description: This robot-arm application is part of a series of how-to Intel IoT code sample exercises using the Intel® IoT Developer Kit, Intel® Edison board, cloud platforms, APIs, and other technologies.
author: Intel Corporation & Hybrid Group

hwreq: Connect stepper motor controller #1 to pins 4, 5, 6, and 7, and stepper motor controller #2 to pins 8, 9, 10, and 11.
Grove Joystick connected to analog pin 0 (Grove Base Shield Port A0)
